(Thanx Yanshosh)

Vulois was sitting in the base when the shots started firing. He 
looked out the window and saw two bots trying to attack the embassy. 
Vulois contacted Convix.

"What can I do? I can not fight them?"

This is a lesson many bots have learned. Sometimes to achieve peace, 
there must be violence. But you have the Matrix on your side. Use 
your mind power first. Show them your Hell. Make them understand. If 
they don't listen...; you are a TM3 Vulois. That story about Cheetor 
accidentaly creating the driver was phony, we needed a story to lead 
you away. The Matrix planted it there. Not personally, but with a 
messanger like yourself. We wanted you and your chosen three to be 
different, and have super bodies to protect yourselves. We got 
Soundwave, and than Battera, but there was an "incident" from The 
Matrix that provented you from meeting Cybershark.(this "incident" 
will become a factor later on.)

"Than I will go."

Vulois stepped outside, took out his guns, and looked at the bots.

"Embassy, shileds up," he said very calmly. Now he was trying to get 
back to that hypnotized state, where he can use his mind in strange 
ways. He knew it was possible. While he was channeling energy, an 
impenitrable shield went up around his body. Vulois hoped it would 
last, but he knew not. Once he was done powering up, he knew it would 
dissapear and he would have to fight.

"Time to come to my world." He said to the bots......

______________________________________________________________________


"Alright, I'm ready."

Those were the last words Octociz spoke in this form. Brix came 
forward, and opened his chest plate. The two sparks flaoting so close 
were like a burden, weighing on his heart. He felt one, and instantly 
his mind got a picture of Octociz. This was the one. He carefully 
removed it from the area. Once it was gone, Brix felt great. His own 
body, where his thoughts are free. He placed the spark  in the pod 
and closed the lid. He saw through the lid the spark becoming a 
protoform. He turned to Ramulus.

"Your turn."
